message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the financial statements:

1. In the balance sheet, I see "Accumulated Depreciation" with an end amount of 45749.76 as of 2024-01-28.

2. In the cash flow statement, I see a line item "Depreciation" with an amount of 45749.76.

3. In the income statement, I also see "Depreciation" listed as an expense with the amount 45749.76.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of an asset's cost over its useful life. The value 45749.76 appears consistently across all three financial statements, confirming this is the depreciation amount for the period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.76'} }
```
